content:
1. Songkran Festival - The Thai New Year celebration in mid-April
2. Loy Krathong Festival - The Floating Lantern Festival in November.
3. Chinese New Year Festival - February
4. Bangkok International Festival of Dance and Music - September-October
5. Bangkok Street Show - January
6. Royal Ploughing Ceremony - May (dates vary each year)
7. Vegetarian Festival - October (in Chinatown)
8. Children's Day - Second Saturday of January
9. Bangkok Jazz Festival - January-February (dates vary each year)
10. Thailand International Kite Festival - March (held in nearby Hua Hin)
